lines.content: Inspired by Rem from Re:Zero, below are instructions on how to use your personal assistant "Rem".
You can use Rem to add tasks to your personal checklist.
こんにちは (Konnichiwa)! Rem だよ! (I'm Rem!) :>
今日は何ができますか? (What can I do for you today?)
Below are the keywords to start your command with.
1. Type "list" to see your task checklist.
5. To stop Rem and quit the program:
* Main run method for the program.

+ "Please start your command with list, mark, unmark, todo, deadline, event or bye. :')\n");

public final String WELCOME = "こんにちは (Konnichiwa)! Rem だよ! (I'm Rem!) :>\n"
+ "今日は何ができますか? (What can I do for you today?)\n";
public final String GOODBYE = "またね! (See you soon!) <3";
